Fun game; When you have good teammates.
Its a good game but has flaws voice is pretty much a must for survivors if you all wanna survive or win togethere.

I like this game and have several reasons for it:

1) Interesting gameplay - you play either as a survivor or a killer. 4 survivors against one killer. Isn't it thrilling?
2) Large amount of skills that you can use during a match. You can focus on different "techniques" and select the skills that you find exciting to play with.
3) Different survivors and killers. You can choose whoever you want. No limits except for payable characters.
4) Good-looking maps (they have been recently graphically updated) and skins for survivors.

I recommend this game if you really want to survive or kill a bunch of angry survivors :)

Dead By Daylight is an abomination of a game, I couldnt think of a worse way to spend your precious time.
This game has made me want to KILL MYSELF! the games devs are retarded, the game is extremely unbalanced with overpowered survivor perks and items as well as overpowerd killer add ons, environmental hit boxes can be outright broken too, you can get caught on thin air.
Playing solo queue survivor is the most infuriating thing a person can do, one bad team mate can completely throw the game.
Dead By daylight has the worst ranking system i have ever seen, you could play against a rank one killer that has no clue what they are doing and visa versa.
loading times can be horrible.
BUT this game is alot of fun and once you learn the basics you can have a really good time, playing this game with friends is how it should be played, its very fun to mess around in custom games or playing survive with friends.
Killer gameplay can be very satisfying, you dont have to rely on potentially trash team mates, the game is in your hands.
Dead By Daylight is the BEST WORST GAME MONEY CAN BUY!

Its pretty fun to play and offers alot of variety in play styles. Although it is easy to get overwhelmed on this game the learning curve isnt too steep. Its definintley a good game just be careful when surviving with randoms. Its best to make friends and survive with friends once you start to rank up. Would recommend!

A very fun and scary game. Sometimes, it can be toxic due to higher level players being toxic. But there are some high ranking players, who play as killers, who interact with the survivors and have them farm for Blood Points. The customization of the Survivors' outfits are very cool. Also, if you are a first time player who is reading this review, make sure to save up your Blood Points and most especially your Iridescent Shards. Make sure to review each Survivors first before purchasing them with your Iridescent Shards. To conclude this review, if you have friends who are gamers as well, make sure to persuade them to play because this is a game of team work and it is more fun if you play with friends!
